Html:
I'm trying to respond to keyboard input on the map control,
but they are never being triggered. Is there a way to fix this?

Listening for KeyDown events from the parent control is not an option
as there needs to be a clear separation of concerns.

Update: The only way I can currently get it to work is by calling .Focus() on the MapControl.
         That surrounds the map control with an ugly dashed line though.
Hi, I got it working for now. Thnx for the quick reply and the great work :-)
